verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:1
verses.text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:2
verses.text: And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:3
verses.text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:4
verses.text: For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.
